content.raw:
Thank's for the quick response. I have run the commands. Unfortunately the results were the same. Then I remembered the issue #187. I’ve done the cleanup described there. Now the ros-bridge error messages are gone and the node and topics are started. That’s good.

Unfortunately the display issue is still there. Would it make sense to run the commands above again.
content.html:
Thank's for the quick response. I have run the commands. Unfortunately the results were the same. Then I remembered the issue #187. I’ve done the cleanup described there. Now the ros-bridge error messages are gone and the node and topics are started. That’s good.

Unfortunately the display issue is still there. Would it make sense to run the commands above again.
